curam.util.administration.intf
Interface BatchAdmin

All Known Implementing Classes:
curam.util.administration.base.BatchAdmin
Direct Known Subclasses:
BatchAdminFactory
public abstract class BatchAdmin
extends curam.util.administration.base.BatchAdmin

BatchAdmin is the administration interface for Curam Batch Processing. It provides methods for modifying the description of a batch process, adding or removing batch groups and associating batch groups with batch processes.

addProcessToGroup

public void addProcessToGroup(long groupId,
                              java.lang.String processDefName)
                       throws DatabaseException,
                              AppException,
                              InformationalException
Add a Batch Process to a Batch Group. A batch process cannot be added to the same group twice and can only be added to a group if a batch process description is defined for it.

Parameters:
groupId - The ID of the batch group to add to.
processDefName - The name of the batch process to add.
Throws:
AppException - PROCESS_ALREADY_IN_GROUP - if the batch process is already in the specified group.
AppException - PROC_DESC_NOT_FOUND - if a batch process description is not defined for the batch process.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

public void removeProcessFromGroup(long groupId,
                                   java.lang.String processDefName)
                            throws DatabaseException,
                                   AppException,

Parameters:

processDefName - The name of the batch process to remove.

modifyOrAddBatchProcDescription

public void modifyOrAddBatchProcDescription(java.lang.String processDefName,
                                            java.lang.String procLongName,
                                            java.lang.String description,
                                            java.lang.String batchType,
                                            int versionNo)
                                     throws DatabaseException,
                                            AppException,
                                            InformationalException
Modify a Batch Process Description. If the Batch Process description does not exist, it will be added.

Parameters:
processDefName - The name of the process whose description is to be modified/added.
procLongName - The long (descriptive) name of the batch process.
description - The description of the batch process.
batchType - The type of the batch process.
versionNo - The version number of the parameter (used by the optimistic locking mechanism).
Throws:
AppException - PROC_DEF_NOT_FOUND - if a batch process definition could not be found.
AppException - ID_RECORD_CHANGED - if the target record has been modified.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

modifyBatchParamDesc

public void modifyBatchParamDesc(java.lang.String processDefName,
                                 java.lang.String paramName,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 java.lang.String defaultValue,
                                 int versionNo)
                          throws DatabaseException,
                                 AppException,
                                 InformationalException
Modify a Batch Parameter Description. If the batch parameter does not have a description an exception is thrown.

Parameters:
processDefName - The name of the batch process whose parameter description is to be modified/added.
paramName - The name of the parameter whose description will be updated/added.
description - The description of the parameter.
defaultValue - The default value for the parameter.
versionNo - The version number of the parameter (used by the optimistic locking mechanism).
Throws:
AppException - PARAM_DESC_NOT_FOUND - if a parameter with the specified name could not be found.
AppException - ID_RECORD_CHANGED - if the target record has been modified.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

retrieveParamList

public BatchParamDescDetList retrieveParamList(java.lang.String processDefName)
                                        throws DatabaseException,
                                               AppException,
                                               InformationalException
Retrieve the details of each parameter associated with a specified Batch Process. The details include the parameter name, the name of the associated batch process, the description and default value of the parameters.

Parameters:
processDefName - The name of the batch process whose parameter descriptions are to be returned.
Returns:
The details (name, description and defaultValue) of each parameter associated with the specified batch process. This is empty if there are no associated parameters.
Throws:
AppException - PARAM_DESC_NOT_FOUND - if one of the parameters associated with the batch process has no description.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getBatchProcessesWithDesc

public BatchProcDetList getBatchProcessesWithDesc()
                                           throws DatabaseException,
                                                  AppException,
                                                  InformationalException
Return the details of all the Batch Processes which have descriptions. The details include the descriptive long name, description, batch type, process definition name, default value and the number of parameters associated with the process.

Returns:
The details (longName, description, batchType, processDefName, defaultValue and numberOfParams) of each of the batch processes which have a description defined for them.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                                              throws DatabaseException,
                                                     AppException,
                                                     InformationalException
Return the details of all the Batch Processes which have no descriptions. The details include the descriptive long name, description, batch type, process definition name, default value and the number of parameters associated with the process.

Returns:
The details (longName, description, batchType, processDefName, defaultValue and numberOfParams) of each of the batch processes which have no description defined for them.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

readParameterDetails

public BatchParamDescriptionDetails readParameterDetails(java.lang.String processDefName,
                                                         java.lang.String paramName)
                                                  throws DatabaseException,
                                                         AppException,
                                                         InformationalException
Return the details associated with a specified parameter. The details include the parameter name, the name of the associated batch process, the description and default value of the parameter.

Parameters:
processDefName - The name of the process with which the parameter is associated.
paramName - The name of the parameter whose details should be returned.
Returns:
The details (paramName, processDefName, description, default value and version number) associated with the specified parameter.
Throws:
AppException - PARAM_DESC_NOT_FOUND - if the description for the specified parameter could not be found.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

addBatchRequest

public void addBatchRequest(java.lang.String processDefName,
                            java.lang.String paramList,
                            java.lang.String userName,
                            java.lang.String deprecated)
                     throws DatabaseException,
                            AppRuntimeException,
                            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                            AppException,
                            InformationalException
Add a Batch Process Request. This request will be executed when the BatchLauncher is run at a later date. A KeySet called BATCHPREQ is used to obtain a UniqueID for the process request. This is a human readable key set that must be configured in advance of a call to this method.

Parameters:
processDefName - The name of the process to add.
paramList - This tab delimited string represents the parameter format for a batch process request. The string is in the form: <name> \t<value> \t<mandatory> \t<data type> \t<description>. Multiple parameters can be added by separating the parameters with newline character.
userName - The user name to associate with the request.
deprecated - No longer used
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_KEY_SET_NOT_FOUND - if the BATCHPREQ Key Set cannot be found.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the paramList does not have 5 entries.

getBatchGroups

public BatchGroupDetList getBatchGroups()
                                 throws DatabaseException,
                                        AppException,
                                        InformationalException
Return details of the Batch Groups. The details include the group ID and the group Name.

Returns:
A list of tuples (groupId and groupName) describing each of the batch groups.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                                      throws DatabaseException,

Parameters:

Returns:
A list of tuples (processDefName, processLongName and numberofParams) describing each of the items within a batch group.

addBatchErrorCode

public void addBatchErrorCode(java.lang.String errorCodeID,
                              int errorCode)
                       throws DatabaseException,
                              AppException,
                              InformationalException
Add a Batch Error Code.

Parameters:
errorCodeID - Message identifier, e.g. `curam.util.message.infrastructure.RUN_ID_RUNTIME`, which is the message catalog entry RUN_ID_RUNTIME.
errorCode - Batch Error Code.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - ERROR_CODE_ALREADY_ADDED - if the Batch Error Code has already been added.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

modifyBatchErrorCode

public void modifyBatchErrorCode(java.lang.String errorCodeID,
                                 int errorCode,
                                 int versionNo)
                          throws DatabaseException,
                                 AppException,
                                 InformationalException
Remove the Batch Error Code with the given Message ID.

Parameters:
errorCodeID - Message identifier, e.g. `curam.util.message.infrastructure.RUN_ID_RUNTIME`, which is the message catalog entry RUN_ID_RUNTIME.
errorCode - Batch Error Code to be modified.
versionNo - The version number of the parameter (used by the optimistic locking mechanism).
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - ERROR_CODE_NOT_FOUND - if the Batch Error Code could not be found.
AppException - ID_RECORD_CHANGED - if the target record has been modified.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

modifyOrAddBatchParamDisplayNames

public void modifyOrAddBatchParamDisplayNames(java.lang.String processDefName,
                                              java.lang.String paramName,
                                              java.lang.String description,
                                              java.lang.String paramLongName,
                                              int versionNo)
                                       throws AppException,
                                              InformationalException
Modify or Add batch param translation.

Parameters:
processDefName - definition name.
paramName - parameter name.
description - parameter description.
paramLongName - param long name.
versionNo - version no.
Throws:
AppException - results in AppException on any issues.
InformationalException - throws exception for any errors.
